com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
Class ARMetaioCloudPluginManager

java.lang.Object
  com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.ARMetaioCloudPluginManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.MetaioCloudDataManager.Callback, MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
public class ARMetaioCloudPluginManager
extends Object
implements MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.MetaioCloudDataManager.Callback, SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback

This class provides base implementation for most of the methods required by a Metaio Cloud Plugin application. You can override the methods you need and provide custom functionality

 class ARMetaioCloudPluginManager.ARELDatasourceCallback

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when GLSurfaceView has been created. The rendering contents can be loaded in this callback, e.g geometries. Furthermore, renderer parameters such as clipping plane limits can be updated. The audio renderer for movie textures should be registered in this callback.

Specified by:
onSurfaceCreated in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
See Also:
getAudioRenderer

onSurfaceChanged

public void onSurfaceChanged(int width,
                             int height)
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Called when OpenGL surface is resized. The new dimensions must be passed to metaioSDK by calling metaioSDK.resizeRenderer.

Specified by:
onSurfaceChanged in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Parameters:
width - Width of the surface view
height - Height of the surface view

onSurfaceDestroyed

public void onSurfaceDestroyed()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Called when OpenGL surface is destroyed

Specified by:
onSurfaceDestroyed in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

onDrawFrame

public void onDrawFrame()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when metaio SDK should render next frame. The callback implementation must call IMetaioSDK.render() to update.

Specified by:
onDrawFrame in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

public float getRotationOffset()
Gets the offset rotation angle according to the screen rotation

Returns:
angle in degrees to be added to compensate screen rotation (i.e. for views that act as a compass)

Removes all the content and starts scan mode. Stoping scan mode will load current channel

public void takeScreenshot()

showVisualSearchResults

public void showVisualSearchResults()
Stub. This method is called to show visual search results requested by calling ARMetaioCloudPluginManager#performChannelVisualSearch().

Note that it is called before the actual request is made, so that application can switch to another Activity, and the activity must register callback to MetaioCloudDataManager to receive the results.

enabled -

codeValue - Code value

trackAPIUsage

public void trackAPIUsage(int statusCode,
                          String apiCall,
                          String extraInfo,
                          float requestDuration)
Stub. String used to log to your analytics tracking systems if you want. This is just a stub. There is no need to call the superclass.

Parameters:
statusCode - status code of the request logged
apiCall - api call that was requested
extraInfo - addition info
requestDuration - how long did the call take
